article.title: Lockheed Martin Supports U.S. Navy Technology Facilities
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Maritime Systems and Sensors, Moorestown, New Jersey, is being awarded a more than $8 million contract modification to exercise options for fiscal 2011 technical and engineering support and related operation and maintenance of the Navy's Combat Systems Engineering Development Site and technical engineering support of the SPY-1A test lab and Naval Systems Computing Center. The Naval Sea Systems Command, Washington Navy Yard, D.C., is the contracting activity.
